summary: After fierce war chief Ulzana and a small war party jump the reservation bent on murder and terror, an inexperienced young lieutenant is assigned to track him down.

keywords: chiricahua apache|shot in the back|territory|holed up in shack|shack
title: La venganza de Ulzana
